comments.body:
Add comment in the line above `license_file` that looks something like:

```
...
# License file manually packaged. See: https://github.com/Trusted-AI/AIF360/pull/206
license_file: LICENSE
```

I've opened https://github.com/Trusted-AI/AIF360/pull/206 upstream and the comment will be a reminder to check to see if the license file is included in future releases so that the one included besides the `meta.yaml` can be removed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +44,48 @@  license: Apache-2.0
  # License file manually packaged. See: https://github.com/Trusted-AI/AIF360/pull/206
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
